languages.text: Спинка трона вымазана чем-то темно-бурым и застарелым.

traits.locale_text: Чем дальше вы углубляетесь в партеры капеллы, тем меньше занятых астропатических тронов вам встречается. На многих из них вы замечаете темно-бурые следы разной степени давности.

languages.text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.
languages.original_text: Спинка трона вымазана чем-то темно-бурым и застарелым.

traits.locale_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark-brown and old.
The back of the throne is smeared with something dark-brown and old.
The back of the throne is smeared with something dark-brown and old.
The back of the throne is smeared with something dark-brown and old.
The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.
The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.

languages.text: La parte trasera del trono tiene una mancha antigua de color rojo oscuro.
languages.original_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.

traits.locale_text: La parte trasera del trono tiene una mancha antigua de color rojo oscuro.

languages.text: 王座の後ろ側に、古くて濃い赤い汚れが付着している。
languages.original_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.

traits.locale_text: 王座の後ろ側に、古くて濃い赤い汚れが付着している。

languages.text: 宝座背面沾着某些深红色的东西，应该是很久以前沾上的。
languages.original_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.

traits.locale_text: 宝座背面沾着某些深红色的东西，应该是很久以前沾上的。

languages.text: Die Rückseite des Throns ist mit etwas beschmiert, dunkelrot und alt.
languages.original_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.

traits.locale_text: Die Rückseite des Throns ist mit etwas beschmiert, dunkelrot und alt.

languages.text: Le dossier du trône est maculé d'une substance rouge sombre visiblement assez ancienne.
languages.original_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.

traits.locale_text: Le dossier du trône est maculé d'une substance rouge sombre visiblement assez ancienne.

languages.text: Tahtın arkasına koyu kırmızı ve kurumuş bir şey bulaşmış.
languages.original_text: The back of the throne is smeared with something dark red and old.
